AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am currently a dedicated Software Development student with a strong foundation in creating and developing innovative projects. My passion lies in leveraging modern technologies and best practices to produce high-quality, scalable applications. I continuously seek opportunities to improve my skills and contribute to meaningful projects.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
